long_description: Made of airy, open-knit rib fabric that wicks moisture and dries quickly, the men's Patagonia Lightweight Boxer Briefs will keep you comfortable during any adventure. Itch-free elastic waistband is soft and comfortable, and a cover-stitched hem offers a smooth glide under shorts or pants. The men's Patagonia Lightweight Boxer Briefs feature a fabric treatment to help deter odors. Supportive front panel and a fully functioning, self-fabric fly. Fabric features a high recycled content; formfitting.
short_description: Made of airy, open-knit rib fabric that wicks moisture and dries quickly, the men's Patagonia Lightweight Boxer Briefs will keep you comfortable during any adventure.
